titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to enhance the refinancing of home loans by veterans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3715)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
5/1/2008--Introduced.
Increases, for veterans with home loans, the maximum guaranty limit for refinance loans and the percentage of an existing loan that the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) will refinance.
